00014 curlyqueue_node_t* curly_create_node( void* value, curlyqueue_node_t* prev, curlyqueue_node_t* next ){
00015         
00016         curlyqueue_node_t* node = ( curlyqueue_node_t* )malloc( sizeof( curlyqueue_node_t ) );
00017         
00018         node->value     = value;
00019         node->prev      = prev;
00020         node->next      = next;
00021

00032 curlyqueue_t* curly_create_queue(){
00033         
00034         curlyqueue_t* queue = malloc( sizeof( curlyqueue_t ) );
00035         
00036         queue->back             = NULL;
00037         queue->front    = NULL;
00038         queue->count    = 0;
00039         
00040         return queue;
00041 }

00051 void curly_destroy_queue( curlyqueue_t* queue ){
00052         
00056         curlyqueue_node_t* curr = queue->back;
00057                 
00061         curlyqueue_node_t* next;
00062         
00063         /* while the current node isn't the end of the list*/
00064         while( curr != NULL ){
00065                 
00066                 next = curr->next;
00067                 
00068                 free( curr );
00069                 
00070                 curr = next;
00071                 
00072                 queue->count--;
00073         }
00074         
00075         
00076         free( queue );
00077         
00078         /* dedangle pointer */
00079         queue = NULL;
00080 }

00089 void curly_enqueue( curlyqueue_t* queue, void* value ){
00090         
00091         curlyqueue_node_t* prev = NULL;
00092         curlyqueue_node_t* next = queue->back;
00093         
00094         curlyqueue_node_t* node = curly_create_node( value, prev, next );
00095         
00096         /* if this is the first node, the tail = the head*/
00097         if( curly_queue_is_empty( queue ) ){
00098                 
00099                 queue->front = node;
00100                 
00101         }else{
00102                 
00103                 queue->back->prev = node;
00104                 
00105         }
00106         
00107         queue->back = node;
00108         
00109         /* increment the list's internal count of nodes */
00110         queue->count++; 
00111 }

00116 void* curly_dequeue( curlyqueue_t* queue, except_t* e ){
00117         
00118         if( curly_queue_is_empty( queue ) ){
00119                 /* throw exception */
00120                 e->thrown = 1;
00121                 memcpy( e->type, "empty_q", 8 );
00122                 return NULL;
00123         }
00124 
00125         /* store the value of the node currently at the front of the q */
00126         void* value = queue->front->value;
00127 
00128         if( 1 == queue->count ){
00129 
00130                 free( queue->front );
00131 
00132                 /* dedangle pointers */
00133                 queue->front    = NULL;
00134                 queue->back     = NULL;
00135 
00136         }else{
00137                 curlyqueue_node_t* old_front    = queue->front;
00138                 curlyqueue_node_t* new_front    = queue->front->prev;
00139 
00140                 queue->front = new_front;
00141                 new_front->next = NULL;
00142 
00143                 free( old_front );              
00144         }
00145 
00146         queue->count--;
00147 
00148         return value;
00149 }

00160 int curly_queue_is_empty( curlyqueue_t* queue ){
00161         if( 0 == queue->count ){
00162                 return 1;
00163         }else{
00164                 return 0;
00165         }
00166 }
